column5: I want to watch it, don't know if it will play in Canada. thank god they did not make a moive about the Seal hunting.

I watched that movie, you can download it almost anywhere... Very informative and a unique style of documentary. Highly recommend! Trying to capture videos of the secretive dauphin slaughter was indeed challenging and interesting!
I love docs, but have yet to see this one, but a girl I work with is bringing it for me shortly. Should be interesting!

Yeah, I saw it.  Very interesting.  The guy who "invented" Flipper has done a complete 180 on dolphin capture and shows some very very disturbing footage on the treatment of these creatures.  Good watch.  Dan
so are dolphinï»¿ to Japan like seals are to Canada  I didn't see it but if they are taking them for food, then I don't see the problem...guess I should see the show before I comment
